body:
Write a test plugin:

``` ruby
# lib/fluent/out_test.rb
module Fluent
  class TestOutput < Output
    Plugin.register_output('test', self)

    config_param :tag, :string

    def emit(tag, es, chain)
      router.emit_stream(@tag, es)
      chain.next
    end
  end
end
```

Running with conf like below works well:

``` apache
<source>
  type dummy
  tag dummy
</source>

<match dummy>
  type test
  tag test
</match>

<match test>
  type stdout
</match>
```

However, running with conf like below fails:

``` apache
<source>
  type dummy
  tag dummy
</source>

<match dummy>
  type copy
  <store>
    type test
    tag test
  </store>
</match>

<match test>
  type stdout
</match>
```

as

```
2014-12-14 04:22:01 +0900 [warn]: emit transaction failed: error_class=NoMethodError error="undefined method `emit_stream' for nil:NilClass" tag="dummy"
  2014-12-14 04:22:01 +0900 [warn]: /Users/seo.naotoshi/src/github.com/fluent/fluentd/lib/fluent/plugin/out_test.rb:8:in `emit'
  2014-12-14 04:22:01 +0900 [warn]: /Users/seo.naotoshi/src/github.com/fluent/fluentd/lib/fluent/output.rb:32:in `next'
  2014-12-14 04:22:01 +0900 [warn]: /Users/seo.naotoshi/src/github.com/fluent/fluentd/lib/fluent/plugin/out_copy.rb:72:in `emit'
```

This is because `router` is defined at `add_match` https://github.com/fluent/fluentd/blob/8780a84137cdfdeba608a2598c531ea7153e201a/lib/fluent/agent.rb#L126, but it is not defined inside out_copy.rb https://github.com/fluent/fluentd/blob/8780a84137cdfdeba608a2598c531ea7153e201a/lib/fluent/plugin/out_copy.rb#L42
title: router is not defined in out_copy
